scripts.web: cd apps/next && doppler run -- yarn next
scripts.db:gen: cd packages/app/db/drizzle && doppler run -- npx drizzle-kit generate --config ./db/drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/app/db/drizzle && doppler run -- npx drizzle-kit migrate --config ./db/drizzle.config.ts
scripts.db:studio: cd packages/app/db/drizzle && doppler run -- npx drizzle-kit studio --config ./db/drizzle.config.ts
